00040 class CL_PixelPipeline;

00046 class CL_SoftwareProgram
00047 {
00049 public:
00050         virtual ~CL_SoftwareProgram() { }
00051 
00052         virtual int get_attribute_count() const = 0;
00053         virtual int get_attribute_index(const CL_StringRef &name) const = 0;
00054         virtual CL_Vec4f get_attribute_default(int index) { return CL_Vec4f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f); }
00055         virtual void set_uniform(const CL_StringRef &name, const CL_Vec4f &vec) = 0;
00056         virtual void set_uniform_matrix(const CL_StringRef &name, const CL_Mat4f &mat) = 0;
00057 
00058         virtual CL_PixelCommand *draw_triangle(CL_PixelPipeline *pipeline, const std::vector<CL_Vec4f> &attribute_values) = 0;
00059         virtual CL_PixelCommand *draw_sprite(CL_PixelPipeline *pipeline, const std::vector<CL_Vec4f> &attribute_values) = 0;
00060         virtual CL_PixelCommand *draw_line(CL_PixelPipeline *pipeline, const std::vector<CL_Vec4f> &attribute_values) = 0;
00061 };
